products.title: 1-MONTH PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
products.description: Platinium-IPTV offers you access to the most advanced technology in the world for broadcasting channels. With years of expertise, our IPTV subscriptions are of exceptional quality. The 1-month premium subscription includes a variety of over 22,500 channels, including adult channels, and access to over 50,000 movies and series. Enjoy a seamless and stable experience, backed by regularly updated servers.

products.title: 3-MONTH PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
products.description: Experience top-tier IPTV technology with Platinium-IPTV's 3-month premium subscription. This plan provides access to 22,500 channels, including exclusive adult content, and a vast collection of 50,000+ movies and series. Stay up-to-date with continuous server optimizations for smooth viewing.

products.title: 6-MONTH PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
products.description: Platinium-IPTV's 6-month subscription brings a comprehensive selection of channels, including adult content, with over 22,500 channels and 50,000 movies and series. Enjoy an advanced and reliable streaming experience, with ongoing server improvements ensuring no disruptions.

products.title: 12-MONTH PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
products.description: Commit to a year of high-quality IPTV with Platinium-IPTV's 12-month subscription. This premium plan provides over 22,500 channels and a vast library of movies and series. With constant updates, your viewing experience is guaranteed to be smooth and uninterrupted.

products.title: 1-MONTH STANDARD SUBSCRIPTION
products.description: The 1-month standard subscription from Platinium-IPTV offers a broad range of channels, with over 22,500 available. Enjoy access to an extensive library of 50,000+ movies and series, supported by our stable and efficient servers, updated regularly to ensure the best experience.

products.title: 3-MONTH STANDARD SUBSCRIPTION
products.description: Platinium-IPTV's 3-month standard subscription includes access to over 22,500 channels and an extensive library of movies and series. With regular updates, our servers provide a smooth, uninterrupted viewing experience.

products.title: 6-MONTH STANDARD SUBSCRIPTION
products.description: This 6-month standard subscription offers access to over 22,500 channels and more than 50,000 movies and series. Enjoy stable and reliable IPTV services with continuous server updates for a seamless experience.

products.title: 12-MONTH STANDARD SUBSCRIPTION
products.description: Platinium-IPTV’s 12-month standard subscription includes access to over 22,500 channels and 50,000 movies and series. Servers are continuously updated, ensuring smooth and uninterrupted streaming for a full year.

products.title: PLATINUM ELITE SUBSCRIPTION 15-MONTHS
products.description: Upgrade to Platinium-IPTV's ultimate package: the 15-month Elite Platinum subscription. With access to over 25,000 channels and a library of more than 60,000 movies and series, this plan also includes personalized support. Enjoy top-tier servers that guarantee performance and reliability, with frequent updates ensuring a smooth, uninterrupted viewing experience.
